protocol_core.protocol_name: Size selection for decidua cells smaller than 40 microns.
protocol_core.protocol_description: The supernatant was diluted with medium and passed through 100um cell sieve (Corning, 431752) and then 40um cell sieve (Corning, 431750). The flow-through was centrifuged and resuspended in 5ml of red blood cell lysis buffer (Invitrogen, 00-4300) for 10min.
